@@info: Here are translations that exist in <en> but not in <fi>.
After editing this file, you can run 'dart run slang apply --locale=fi' to quickly apply the newly added translations.

noDiscovery.symptom: This device cannot discover other devices.
noDiscovery.solution: Please make sure that all devices are on the same Wi-Fi network and share the same configuration (port, multicast address, encryption). You can try to type the IP address of the target device manually. If this works, consider adding this device to the favorites so it can be automatically discovered in the future.

quickSaveFromFavoritesNotice.title: @:general.quickSaveFromFavorites
quickSaveFromFavoritesNotice.content: File requests are now accepted automatically from devices in your favorites list.
